𓇦 FL/LF 𓇧
M37 𓇦 M21 'even (helfen?)

𓊪 ≈ ph ≈ 𓇦 flax

𓇦 bundle of flax ⇔ fix, flix, flechten

𓂧 𓌳 𓇦 | bind together | δym sym δescim 𓇦
𓂧 𓌳 𓄿 𓇦 𓂡 | bind together | δama zusammen 𓇦 ⇔ serō
𓂧 𓌳 𓇦 | cut off (heads) | deskalpen?
𓂧 𓌳 𓏏 𓆃 | wing | тамэ tāmă

𓇦 ≈ 𓇐 field 𓋴 𓇦 𓅓 𓏜 | succour |
